title: Waive Monthly Account Fee
description: A long-time customer requests to have their monthly maintenance fee waived after their balance temporarily dropped below the minimum.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the monthly fee charge on their statement.
Review the customer's account history and tenure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has been with the bank for 10 years with no prior fee waivers.

tasks.description: Waive the fee for the current month as a one-time courtesy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies a credit for the fee amount.
